alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 25 at 7:21AM CDT until further notice by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Osage River at Taberville affecting St. Clair County. For the Osage River Basin...including Schell City, Taberville... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Osage River at Taberville. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 20.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 26.3 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.4 feet on 03/25/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 730 AM CDT.
